transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello Farid ji se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Farid ji main Asim Khan baat kar raha hun Indiamart.com se business manager. Aapki company register hai Indiamart ke sath mein sir?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Iski service ke regarding sir maine aapko call kiya tha. Abhi recently aapne Indiamart ki services li hai na sir?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Kal shayad aapne call bhi kiya tha sir but baat ho nahi payi thi sir aapse.
Customer: Oh ho okay okay.
Executive: Hmm. Ji boliye.
Executive: To isi ke regarding sir main baat karna chah raha tha. Service jo Indiamart aapko provide karwa raha hai usme agar aap koi problem face kar rahe hain to aap mujhe bata sakte hain. Abhi service kaisi chal rahi hai sir?
Customer: Kuch aapne jaise use kari kuch customer wagera se kuch baat ki aapne ya nahi kara?
Customer: Ji main kai kai logo ko call kiya tha.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: To lead maine use ki thi. Hmm. Okay. Kaafi mujhe thinking karri wali thi, kaam ki lagi thi.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Ye jaise main dekh raha hun aapne teen buylead consume kari hai. Ek to ye hai aapka ye kehte hain Nizamabad turmeric finger double polish, ek hai aapka kya kehte hain turmeric finger ke naam se aur aapka black urad dal ke naam se. Ye teen buylead aapne consume kari hai. To aapka main ye jaanna chah raha tha business jaise kahan kahan rehta hai? All over India rehta hai ya sirf Andhra Pradesh aur Telangana rehta hai?
Customer: All India aur rehta hai.
Executive: All over India rehta hai. To aapko I hope sir aapko bataya hoga ki jo service aapne li hai Indiamart se aapko bataya bhi hoga is service mein Indiamart jo provide karwata hai aapko 10 buylead weekly deta hai aur ek buylead per day deta hai. Yani total 17 buyleads aapko provide karwate hain hum log.
Executive: To ye meri aapse request haan to ye meri aapse request hai ki aap koshish kya kare rozana ek do ek do ek do buylead aap consume kare. Kyunki jitna zyada buyleads ka consumption aap karenge jitna buyer se aap connect karenge utni zyada possibility rahegi aapko buyer milne ki aur jo bhi buylead aap consume kare wo recent buylead jo aayi hui hai latest buylead yani jaise main dekh raha hun aapne ek buylead use kari hai black urad dal ki ye buylead sir 24th November ko post hui thi aur aapne 27th November yani aaj consume kari hai. To ho sakta hai is buyer se aapki proper baat na hui ho. To aap koshish kya karo ki same day wali jo latest buyleads hai unhi ko hi aap consume karo. Wahan connectivity achi aati hai sir.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Aap purani buyer kyunki maan lo teen din pehle main agar koi requirement dalu ya aap koi requirement dalo teen din pehle aur main aapko teen char din ke baad call karu to aap bilkul yahi bologe ki Asim aap bahut late call kar rahe ho meri already baat kisi se ho gayi hai ya maine finalize kar liya hai. Latest buylead mein ye rehta hai ki main aapko wahan par bol sakta hun ki sir aapne requirement dali to aap bologe haan quotation bhejiye wahan par. To ye main aapko baki to sir jaise jaise aap service ko use karoge buyer ke sath mein aap connect karoge unka follow up loge to wo dheere dheere aapke follow up ban ke fir wahan par aapko deal bhi milna start ho jayengi sir.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Abhi jaise ye call bhi aaya tha sir aapko kal shayad kal aaya tha aapko ye call. Ye miss ho gaya tha aapse call. Aapki baat hui fir dobara buyer se sir?
Customer: Kaun se buyer ke sath?
Executive: Ye ek buyer ki call aayi thi 23rd November ko aapko aayi thi Andhra Pradesh ki thi ek buyer the koi sir.
Customer: Kaun sa kaun sa uska naam?
Executive: Aap sir naam hamare paas show nahi karta security purpose se wo sara kuch aapko dikhta hai. Agar aap dekhna chahte hain na kis buyer ki aapko call aayi thi to jo mobile application hai na sir Indiamart ka mobile application mein aapko wahan par sir ek lead manager ka option dikhega usme calls ka option aapko aayega wahan par aap dekh sakte hain kaun kaun si call aapne received kari hai kaun si missed kari hai wo sari detail wahan par dikh jati hai sir.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Haan to aap agar aapke paas buyer ka number aapke paas hai?
Customer: Haan puchiye.
Customer: Aap agar mujhe jo 20 mein aap 10 leads dete hain na. Wo lead jo 10 minute nahi hai. 10 minute dete hain ya daily one mein deta hai daily two aise dete hain?
Executive: Kya main samjha nahi sir dobara thoda tez bolenge thoda aawaz bahut halki aa rahi hai sir aapki.
Customer: Aap bol rahe the aapko 10 lead di jayegi per week.
Executive: Bilkul correct sir bilkul correct.
Customer: To wo 10 lead aap ek hi din mein denge ya daily ek ek karke?
Executive: Nahi 10 10 buylead jo milengi aapko wo ek hafte mein milengi jo ki aapko milti hain Saturday ki raat ko aur wo chalti hain Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday. Is tarah se aapka cycle chalega. To wo aapke upar depend karta hai ki 10 buylead aap chahe to ek hi din mein use kar le ya do din mein use kar le ya rozana ek ek do do karke use kar le. Iske alawa jo hai iske alawa Indiamart aapko ek buylead aur deta hai rozana wo daily bonus hoti hai wo agar aap use nahi karoge rozana to wo next day aapki lapse ho jayegi wo carry forward nahi hoti. Jabki weekly jo buyleads hoti hain wo next day ke liye carry forward bhi ho jati hain wo pure week mein kabhi use karna hoti jab chahe tab aap use kar sakte ho.
Customer: Mere ko kaisa pata chalta hai wo buylead daily aane wali hai ya weekly aane wali hai?
Executive: Wo aapko sir wahan par wo aapko sir application mein bhi dikh jayega ki aapke paas weekly buyleads kitni hai ek available hai ya wo aapne consume kar li. Nahi to agar aap laptop wagera par available rehte hain to buylead ke section mein transaction history ka option hota hai wahan par bhi aapko dikh jayega sir.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Aap kisi time sir available ho sakte hain kya rehte hain main aapko agar video call karwa du apni team se agar aap video call par online aa jaye to aur acche se aapko explain kar denge sir wahan pe.
Customer: Ji main to abhi available nahi hun.
Executive: Abhi available hai na sir to main aisa karta hun aap mujhe 10 minute ka time dijiye sir main aapko 3 o clock aapko apni team se video call karwata hun aap video call par online aa jayiyega wo sara kuch aapko guide kar denge sir.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai 10 minute ke andar main aapko call back karwata hun theek rahega koi dikkat to nahi hai?
Customer: Ji. Nahi nahi nahi.
Executive: Theek hai haan main aapko 10 minute ke andar call karwata hun aapko call aayega to aap call answer kar lijiyega.
Customer: Lekin mere ko subscription lene se pehle to ye kaha tha aapke sirf aap hi ke liye ek lead manager hoga wo aapko daily leads wo provide karwayega. Jaisa ki wo aapko verify leads aapko dega.
Executive: Haan to wo lead sir aapko wahan dikhe wo lead manager mein sir aap dekhiye wo dikh rahi hongi aapko lead sir wahan par.
Customer: Okay okay just connect hone ke baad baat karta hun main.
Executive: Main aapko video call par connect karwata hun team se wo aapko aur bhi acche se sare points clear kar denge to wo aur bhi theek rahega sir aapke liye.
Customer: Haan okay okay.
Executive: Theek hai 10 minute ke andar main call kar 3:05 tak aapko call aa jayegi sir. Okay shukriya ji.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know about buyleads distribution.

- Enquired about lead manager.



Resolution:

- Explained about weekly and daily buyleads.

- Explained about lead manager in application.

- Executive offered a video call with team.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back in 10 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, lead manager, application
